reviews.text: Love this place! The frozen espresso martini is to DIE FOR! Fernando was great and we got out food fast on a Tuesday night.
Great atmosphere, good food and espresso martinis, and our server Chris was very kind and helpful
Very  friendly staff especially handsome Chris. Thank you, it was very nice experience and delicious food.

I could not choose a better place for the NYC Marathon celebration. The restaurant was able to host 14 of us without any issues. The staff was very nice and polite to us. Thank you so much for having us, I hope we can do our celebration there again.
It was delicious, and the service was  excelent by Chris.
Chris nos trat√≥ muy bien excelente servicio

Had a reservation in the dining room and was made to sit at the bar. Hostess had the audacity to rudely accuse us of arriving after the 15 minute grace period even though that was not the case. Food was ok. Nothing amazing. Honestly baffles me why there aren‚Äôt better dining options around Lincoln Center.
Oscar was phenomenal and very attentive. Food was great!
Chris is a delight ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Neighborhood gem!

Best pasta place on UWS currently.. Chris our waiter was amazing, very friendly and a great company during our dinner.
Gave us great recommendations and had a blast
Loved the food, ambience and service. Chris was fantastic and very sweet. Had a lovely time.
alexa was such a great server! so sweet and her recommendations were great!!!
Food was amazing. I highly recommend trying this restaurant. Chris was the best server ever! He made our experience perfect!
Me and my friends came back the second time already and it was as lovely as the first time we went. Amazing Ambiente, good food, cocktails and our server Chris was absolutely amazing.

Great little restaurant with good italian food. Me and my husband enjoyed dining there a lot. Our server Chris was amazing too, good knowledge of the food and drink selection, really made it special for us! He recommended trying the frozen espresso martini and it was definitely a hit. Thank‚Äòs Chris and Canto Restaurant, we will be back!
Chris was a wonderful server. Attentive and kind in a busy and lively dining room. Delicious food!
Oscar was great!
Oscar is great! Food is delicious
Great food and service from Chris was great. Will be back
A++ experience! Wonderful dinner, and Nico was the best!!!!

Absolutely best meals experienced in a while. Everyone was more than pleased with their appetizers,  meals and desserts. Over the top experience!
Nico and the entire staff were exceptionally friendly and attentive.
Paola is amazing! So kind and attentive. Cheers!
my favorite dinner and HH spot! Everything from the atmosphere, food and service! We often have Paola who takes care of us and SHES WONDERFUL! Can‚Äôt recommend Canto enough!!
Great experience with friends to celebrate birthdays. Oscar was out waiter, and he made our experience extra special and welcoming. The food is delicious! Definitely recommend!
It‚Äôs so cute inside and a great place for large groups. Definitely recommend and our waiter was EVERYTHING!
Incredible staff. Gorgeous chill atmosphere. Had a birthday party here and they wonderful.
Nico was great!
Chris was the best waiter ! He is an amazing server his food recomendations were amazing !! We ll back soon !! üëåüèªü§©
Chicken Francese and the lasagna were delicious
The food, service, and ambiance were great. Nico was so nice and attentive. He was very sweet and a great waiter. Definitely planning our next visit.
Paola was a great server. very helpful.
Fernando is a great server. He was very helpful. love this place. üòä

The best!!!
A melhor carbonara que j√° comi!
Atendimento excelente! Nico √© um amor, super simp√°tico e receptivo e ainda falou portugu√™s comigooo!!
Muy Burma la comida y la cordial atencion de Fernando
Canto always has the best atmosphere and the friendliest servers!
Had a great dinner before heading to the concert. Chris was super kind and checked in on us during the meal. Very satisfied with the food and service
We had a wonderfull night at Canto ! we loved Paola how she took care of us ! the food and drinks were insane ! we ll be back for sure !! üëåüëåüëå
Nico is rhe best server I've ever had! Thank you!!! Grest espresso martinis too.
Juanes-best bar tender! Awesome brunch!
Chris and Gigi were so amazing and accommodating! Very professional and great service. Can't wait to come back.
Had an amazing meal here. Came here for a mid day drink. Host was very friendly and was able to seat us right away. Would 100% come back!!

The host GIGI was the sweetest ever and def made the experience better!! I called to make a day of reservation and she sat us at the most perfect table outside. Frozen espresso martini was to die for and Gigi kept checking on us throughout our brunch. 10/10 recommend. Will be coming back for sure. <3

I must have come on an off night. The hostess (not the one with glasses) was the rudest person I‚Äôve ever encountered. She seemed bothered when I asked if they had space for one at the bar. She then berated a couple who moved spots so they didn‚Äôt have to be in front of the bartenders splashing theatrics and waitstaff congregating at the host stand.
The wait staff seemed like they were huddled in the front, back, everywhere but doing nothing.
It was ten minutes before they took my order. The order was out not two minutes later by someone wearing rubber gloves. (Clearly a food runner?‚Ä¶ which makes zero sense considering the amount of waitstaff and size of the place.)
The food came out cold and flavorless and not one person asked if I needed anything or asked how my meal was the entire time.
I set a timer and it took 8 min for the bar back to ask me if I needed anything. He then spent five minutes trying to find the waitress. She held up the screen to check out and again didn‚Äôt ask how everything was.
The service was so bad I couldn‚Äôt even bring myself to tip.
The only person actually working was the food runner and the bar back.
As someone who worked In hospitality consulting, the chaos of this place was mesmerizing. The service could have offset the food or vice versa but on this occasion Canto UWS fell short across the board.
Fernando nos atendi√≥ muy amistoso y amablemnte
Absolutely amazing experience! Every dish was super tasty!!! Such cute vibes too. Thank you so much Paula for being the best waitress!
Oscar was the best! Great place, not super expensive, good portion sizes
Restaurant was an amazing ambience. Food was great and paula was an excellent waitress

The food was good but honestly the portion size for main dishes were same size as appetizer, the meatballs appetizer were delicious but the gnochee size was very small for a really expensive price, come on guys!! Is potatoe and cheese, I don‚Äôt mind paying but it was few little balls in a saucy plate, drinks were ok, but not exceptional, service was all over the place, a server came to take orders during dinner 2 other people came to finish his job, he literally dissapeared, would I come Back? Maybe
Would I recommend it? NO!
Great meal and wine. Devon was a great waiter!

Wonderful restaurant, terrific service. Our server was fantastic, came here from Italy, (we spoke Italian for a bit) and was attentive while not being overbearing.
Lovely carbonara, served in a way I have never seen before (with an in tact yolk on top). The rest of the family enjoyed their meal as well. We all had pasta dishes and were quite pleased (Gnocchi, Spaghetti & Meatballs, Penne with Butter and Cheese, the last 2 for the kids).
It was fashionable, but not overly so, with everything from jeans and tee shirts to fancy/club/dress up.
Prices were reasonable. You get what you pay for...
The ricotta cheesecake was ok, not as moist a version as I hoped for, but with a fun brulee top.
All in all. Would go again and again. Really great experience for all.

Everything tonight was DELICIOUS!
The waiter, Mateo, was fantastic, attentive and made sure everything was all ok.

We had raw oysters, burrata and prosciutto, beef carpaccio, lobster ravioli, and carbonara.
A party of 2 and we were delightfully full. Not stuffed, justttttt right!

Would definitely say this would be a spot I would bring people to, and it is a perfect date spot.

The food and the frozen espresso martini was soo good!! I sat outside since the weather was so nice. Great European cozy vibes. Our server was pretty rude though. He got mad at us when he served us food we didn‚Äôt order lol

I had such a great experience at Canto on the Upper West Side! From the moment  we walked in, the hostess Gigi greeted us with such warmth and friendliness ‚Äî she instantly made us feel welcomed Our server was just as wonderful ‚Äî attentive, kind, and really made sure everything was perfect throughout the meal.

The atmosphere was cozy and stylish, the food was absolutely delicious, and the drinks were top notch. Every dish and cocktail was full of flavor and beautifully done.

You can tell Canto cares about both quality and hospitality. Big thanks to the staff  and the  owner for making the night extra special. I‚Äôll definitely be back!

Place is delicious and i would go back!

We had the delicious frozen espresso martinis. Delicious and likely very dangerous ü§£

In terms of food we ordered short rib, caprese salad, Branzino, linguine and clams and a shrimp and spinach pasta dish.

Everything was delicious.

Only complaint is that our second round of drinks did not come at once and took a long time

My friend and I planned on visiting Canto on the upper west side for quite some time. I'm a regular at the original Canto in the west village because I fell in love with one of their house specials one night I visited.

When we arrived, we chose to sit outside because the weather was nice and we're almost in the season where it's about to get cooler. Paola introduced herself to us and was incredibly polite as well as patient while we tried to figure out what we wanted to order. We started off with drinks.

As usual, I'm a double bourbon neat, and my friend chose a martini. After a few sips, we decided to order. I kept it simple with the Bistecca (Skirt Steak), roasted potatoes and an arugula salad. My friend was in the mood for some pasta so she ordered the Veal meatballs in tomato sauce. Both our dishes were nothing short of amazing. My friend devoured her meal in minutes. For desert, we decided to share a Ricotta Cheesecake with a vanilla gelato and strawberries. We both melted after the first bite.

Canto has always been one of my favorite restaurants, but now that they have their second location closer to home, I will be visiting a lot more often. Paola was an amazing host and took care of every request we had. Canto is definitely on my top 5 list of restaurants to go to in NYC.

Came in last night for solo birthday dinner and had such a lovely time. The atmosphere was so nice, the drinks were delicious especially the Frozen Espresso Martini, delicious!!! All the servers were so nice and I had a great time. The food was good, but the ambience and the drinks truly made the whole experience!

Amazing experience! The food was good and arrived in the right timing, Devon our waiter was super friendly and took care even to bring us a dish that was not on the menu!
We had a starter, two pastas and two glasses of wine for only $100!
We will definitely be back again!

Yum! Wanted to come here for a long time, especially for the viral frozen espresso martini. It did nottt disappoint! Small in size but strong in liquor and espresso, and the mascarpone/baileys foam was lovely. Really good drink! $19 but worth it! That being said-- if it were $15 or less I would have had more than one! Something to think about for sales! The carbonara was pretty good, but my husband got the veal meatball spaghetti and WOOOW. I highly recommend that dish! The carbonara was average in comparison. Cozy darker vibes which I personally prefer, beautiful building. Excellent service. Bread toasted nicely and red sauce with ricotta comes with bread service! Thank you

I love Canto. I‚Äôve been here a few times and I‚Äôve never had a meal that disappointed me. The food is really good here and fresh. There are some cocktails that aren‚Äôt the best in my opinion but the frozen espresso martini is delicious, I‚Äôm sure everyone gets that because is popular. Most recently I had nicko as a my server and he was divine. He recommended items from the menu that he thought we should try and he was very friendly. Make sure to show him love if you visit. His service was great.

Sure! Here‚Äôs the updated review with that detail added:

---

Had a great experience at this restaurant! The service was excellent‚ÄîNico, our server, was attentive, friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed. Eric at the bar also stood out with his great energy and perfectly made drinks. The frozen espresso martini was a hit‚Äîdefinitely a must-try! The food was delicious, and the atmosphere was just right‚Äîrelaxed with beautiful lighting and a welcoming vibe. Definitely a spot I‚Äôll be coming back to.

Un pur d√©lice en plein c≈ìur de New-York !!
Nous vous invitons √† d√©couvrir cette tr√®s belle adresse o√π les plats sont exceptionnels. Le personnel est tr√®s agr√©able et discret √† la fois. Tout √©tait parfait ! Au plaisir de revenir...

So I came here with my husband and dog after I saw their IG reel about dogs eating here. Fully expecting there to be some sort of allowance. Also, it gets busy on weekends so I‚Äôd recommend making a reservation. They luckily had outdoor seating. We came a long way to try this place and I hadn‚Äôt thought it was a fancy Italian place. The manager found us a table outside and told us we could have the table for an hour. Service was great despite the hectic dinner rush. The food was probably unexpected but some of the best food I‚Äôve tried in the city. I‚Äôd definitely come back. They had a special menu we both ordered off of. I can‚Äôt believe I‚Äôve never heard of this place. My friend sent me the viral dog ig reel but it‚Äôs filmed in an empty restaurant that looks like a diner so we weren‚Äôt sure what to expect. Great spot for girls night or date night. My husband got the halibut and so got the crab fettuccine. Also the frito misto and kale salad. The frito misto sauce is a bit peppery.

Really casual Italian eatery in UWS. Pasta was surprisingly good, cute vibes, gorgeous bar. It‚Äôs like one of those perfect places you stumble upon randomly. Apparently the frozen espresso martinis are a thing but didn‚Äôt get to try it this time. Not worried though.. Verdict: will return!!

We sat at the bar on a Saturday evening for dinner. Nico was our server - he was pleasant and attentive. We had a round of drinks , the cocktail menu is creative and looks delicious and they also have a great mocktail menu. We had the Pick Up
Line and The Valentina for drinks. For Apps we had the Cesar salad ( I‚Äôve been once before this time and tuna tartare is also amazing.) For entrees we did a steak and two pastas - Lobster Ravioli and Tagliatelle Bolognese both were delicious- would highly recommend both especially the ravioli. Steak was cooked perfectly and came with a side of truffle fries that were also really good. We were stuffed after this meal. The owner Jamel, was really nice and welcoming - he came over to our table a few times to check on us and even bought us a special dessert. I would recommend for a date night or a night out with the girls. The atmosphere is curated beautifully and the decor is chic. We went to the upper west side location. I will absolutely be back.

The frozen espresso martinis and frozen Aperol spritz lived up to the hype. Nico was super sweet, we had a great time and food was tasty! 10/10 would recommend. We were close to $100pp but that‚Äôs because we hung out for a couple hours having cocktails.

Super disappointing bc food was great but dinner was unfortunately overshadowed by awful service. Anytime we needed anything we had to ask the bus boy to get our server, they never checked on us or asked how anything was (during apps, entrees & dessert), some items we ordered never came out but then were on bill, cocktails were always ordered together but would come out staggered. Surrounding tables didn‚Äôt seem to be having great service either. We really wanted to like this place but it just seems they don‚Äôt care.

Marek was really attentive and recommended good options. He also informed us that happy hour was close to end which I thought was really nice! The frozen espresso martini was really refreshing and felt like a dessert too, which I loved because I have a sweet tooth. Will definitely come back!

A great addition to the neighborhood! We have gone a couple of times and consistently enjoy our experience. The truffle Gnocci was phenomenal and there are several cocktails I want to try at future visits. We enjoyed the bar experience, which naturally prompts conversation with others at the restaurant. A nice change from a technology obsessed culture. Highly recommend!

We had the most delightful dinner tonight, and I just have to mention our server, Bellini. What a gem! From the moment we sat down, he was warm, attentive, and so knowledgeable. You can tell he really knows his craft ‚Äî he helped us pick the perfect wines to go with our meals (and he was spot on).

He had that perfect balance of professionalism and friendliness ‚Äî always around when we needed something, but never hovering. Plus, that smile of his just made the whole experience even brighter.

As a mom who‚Äôs eaten out at plenty of restaurants in New York, I can honestly say great service like this makes all the difference. Bellini truly elevated our evening ‚Äî we‚Äôll definitely be back!

Had an amazing experience at Canto! Our waiter, Bellini, was absolutely fantastic - super friendly, attentive, and made us feel so welcome from the start. He really knows the menu and gave us great suggestions. Everything he recommended was delicious!
It‚Äôs rare to find service this genuine and professional at the same time. Bellini made the whole evening even more enjoyable - definitely one of the best servers I‚Äôve had in New York. Highly recommend asking for him when you go!
Devon our server was incredible. We had the best experience with him. The pasta was great and flavorful. Get the frozen espresso martini!!!

The newly opened Canto Upper West Side breathes life into the neighborhood and is a welcome addition to the block.

I had the opportunity to witness their birth with the careful preparation leading up to their grand opening. You could tell that this would quickly become a popular destination.

It was a pleasant experience being greeted and seated by the owner himself. The staff were buzzing with the excitement of the dinner crowd. Their eagerness to provide an experience was observable by the attention and pride of the wait staff.

The food was delicious and was further elevated by the ambiance of the restaurant. It is stunning what they have done with the space. My table enjoyed the cheese and meats appetizer which was beautiful presented. The mushroom ravioli was a filling and flavorful dish I would highly recommend. Special thanks to our bartender who recommend a delicious beet root mocktail.

I can‚Äôt wait to visit again, and again! Thank you for a lovely dinner, the first of many.
Everything was amazing. The carbonara pasta was amazing and the chicken was also amazing. The lamb chops top five in New York. I love the ambience. Can‚Äôt wait to go again.
My wife and I met some friends here! Its a wonderful locale. The staff were very attentive and friendly. The desserts were amazing. We will be coming back.
As a linguine vongole connoisseur, I‚Äôd give Canto‚Äôs 4 stars. I like how the flavor profile leans citrusy. However, the clams weren‚Äôt fresh ‚Äî had a fishy taste to them.

An absolutely delicious dinner! The frozen espresso martini is a must try, the creme br√ªl√©e was equally amazing. I had the most tasty pasta ever and the overall atmosphere was excellent. Our server was wonderful as well!

Oysters were delicious and good happy hour pricing for martinis. Service was veryyyy slow at the bar even though 3 of them were standing back there. I actually got up to just leave but I wanted the frozen martini and oysters so I waited patiently lol

Update I went back next time and everything was horrible. The oysters looked clams they were so tiny I won‚Äôt be back.

We had a wonderful brunch and were served by Bellini, who was an excellent waiter! Very professional, lively, and genuinely warm. He made us feel comfortable and well taken care of throughout the meal. The food was delicious, and I highly recommend trying the frozen espresso martini! Overall, a great experience thanks to Bellini‚Äôs outstanding service.

One of my favorite places.

I enjoy the upper west side location. Juanes is a great bartender. The entire staff is truly very friendly & attentive!

I come for the Happy hour oysters and Frozen Espresso Martinis , I ask for mine with Tequila.

Some feed back: i‚Äôve gotten the oysters a few times & whoever is shucking them should be a little more careful as every oyster always has small pieces of shell.  Oysters are delicious just be careful not to swallow any shell.

Side note: the west village location told me you do not have the tequila option for frozen, which is not true. I have some friends who regularly go to this location & told me they get tequila instead of vodka all the time. I had no issues requesting tequila at the UWS location

Highly recommend, cannot wait to try more food options here.

My friends and I came here for the very first time together, and it was the best decision we have ever made. Their cocktails are out at 10, particularly the martinis uff spicy martini. The food was also very flavorful, and the atmosphere was fantastic. The service and atmosphere are excellent as well. I would like to thank Oscar for taking care of us and for providing us with an outstanding hospitality experience. Our Saturday night was really fun and enjoyable Definitely, we will come back.

Canto on the Upper West Side is a must-visit for anyone seeking a cozy yet stylish dining spot. From the start, our server Oscar was warm, attentive, and full of great recommendations, making the evening even more enjoyable.

The food was absolutely delicious! Each dish was flavorful and beautifully presented, and the drinks complemented the meal perfectly. The atmosphere was inviting, striking a great balance between casual and refined.

Overall, Canto offers top-notch service and outstanding food. We‚Äôll definitely be back!

we had a reservation for 9 o‚Äôclock but after a little waiting, the manager was able to fit us in earlier which was hospitable and appreciated. my partner and i spent our anniversary here! the food was great, we recommend the shrimp crabcakes, the regular/frozen espresso martinis + the buttery pea flower cocktails. andrea was very nice. the server, the tall male with glasses, was very hospitable and made the experience memorable. thank you canto!

Ate at Canto today for the brunch and had the best time. The food was amazing. Plenty of vegetarian options, it was hard to choose just one. The shrimp vol-au-vent was really incredible. The staff were wonderful with our large party.. and best of all, the outdoor tables are dog friendly! My pup had a great time! 10/10 - can‚Äôt wait to be back!

This was an excellent meal! We had about a hour and a half for dinner before a show, and when we explained this to Paula, she was incredible for getting our food out quickly and with care. All of our 4 meals were hot and fresh too. Delicious üòã try for the limoncello tiramisu!

Canto is a great new Italian restaurant on the Upper West Side. We dined at the bar tonight and had an outstanding time all the way around. This establishment is beautiful, the food was great, and the service at the bar was outstanding. We will definitely be returning and would highly recommend Canto. This is a nice date night spot!

Great Brunch & Amazing Service!

We had such a lovely brunch and were served by Bellini, who was absolutely wonderful! He was professional but also super friendly, and even shared a bit about his Italian background, which made the whole experience feel really personal.

The food was delicious, and Bellini made us feel right at home. Highly recommend!

My family and I had such a wonderful evening at Canto Upper West Side! The atmosphere was warm and inviting, the food was excellent, but what truly made the night unforgettable was our server, Sir Bellini.

From the moment we sat down, he made us feel like honored guests.

Sir Bellini didn‚Äôt just serve us dinner, he elevated the entire evening and made it memorable for our whole family.

Highly recommend both the restaurant and requesting Sir Bellini if you want your night to be extra special!

Juanes was incredible!! My husband and I stopped by for a drink and ended up being not just one haha. Cocktails amazing and the service incredible. 10/10 would recommend. Ask for Juanes. Makes a mean Valentina!
Food, drinks and vibes were amazing! Devon was a great waiter. Definitely recommend

My girlfriends and I had such a great time tonight and Nicola, our waiter, made the night even better. He was so friendly and made sure we were having a good time. I also highly recommend the frozen espresso martini! Thank you Nicola!
Food was amazing, drinks were amazing. And given how much we ate and drank - not too expensive. Our waiter Devon took great care of us! Would definitely come back!
Loved the vibe here. Dare I say better than the west village location üôä. Fernando was an amazing server and made the entire experience great.
Juanes was our bartender at Canto UWS and he was amazing. Our glasses were never empty! Highly recommend the frozen espresso martinis and aperol spritz

New restaurant on the UWS. The food was great! We really enjoyed the eggplant appetizer and my lobster ravioli was very good. Currently, they have outdoor seating. I would make a reservation, they get busy!
